name: AstroSpace - Demo
description:
Zenan team

You are working on an adventure game still in development, this being the first DEMO for testing. Thanks to everyone who plays, leave your feedbeck to help with the development.

Synopsis

I'm working on an adventure game set in space, where the protagonist is an astronaut who had his base invaded by aliens and their captured friends. Without knowing the real reason for the attack, he is alone against the aliens and to rescue his friends and find out what they are up to.

Instagram: @zenanstudio, @danielvitor883, @lucasgalvao815, @kaiomapereira, @apaularafaella, @danielsramoss.

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIzaTJ-PP7mgChvaM1CYpaA/videos
